basics.name: William Woodruff
basics.label: Full Stack JS and XR Engineer
basics.summary: William Woodruff aka Bill or Zill, is a full stack JS and XR engineer with a JSNSD (JS Node Services Developer) cert from the Linux Foundation (https://www.credly.com/badges/dc107cd5-6665-4e41-9cf0-406a25a9813c). Bill prefers using hapipal and hapi on the back-end, and react or react-native on the front-end, but has experience with a variety of tech stacks. Most recently for work projects Bill has been implementing an awesome XR UI at, ex: https://app.alakazam.io/yjnqZq5/vibes! He lead the implementation work on the lobby and in-room UI at Alakazam! Outside of work he's been having lots of fun working on his new chatbot, Chappy! Say hello at https://chappyai.com! Also checkout his personal ShaderFes over at https://zillslab.com!

work.name: Alakazam
work.description: A subscription service designed to democratize the 3D space.
work.summary: XR company Alakazam brings affordable self-service metaverse management services to subscription holders!
highlights: Successfully lead the effort for implementing the main Lobby UI, and in-room UI. Checkout the slidy blue background when you hover it's fun! Ex: https://app.alakazam.io/yjnqZq5/vibes.
Worked on Mozilla hubs front-end and the accompanying Elixir back-end to develop full-stack features.
Invented a room state system that self-manages room state including cleanup!
Provided a big fun list of default Avatars (build w/ Ready Player Me) for Alakazam to offer!
Worked on ideas and POCs for how to add games and make interactible experiences to hubs.
Participated in the hubs community and helped host the community meetup.
Identified key areas the company could focus effort on providing back to the OSS community.
Contributions to CI/CD setup

work.name: Big Room Studios
work.description: Designing and building software solutions with love in Portland, Maine since 2002.
work.summary: Designing and building software solutions with love in Portland, Maine since 2002.
highlights: AWS / Cloud experience via managing hosting for several enterprise-level production applications
Client Facing â€” clients seem to like working with me and nobody can figure out why
Develop Web Apps w/ React and Redux
Develop React Native Apps
Create APIs with Node, hapipal, hapi, and friends
Some maintenance work on `hapipal` modules (https://hapipal.com)
Contribute to various other bigroom open source projects including (https://github.com/bigroomstudios/strangeluv)

work.name: XD Creative
work.description: Full Stack web-app, react-native, and XR Development
work.summary: Full Stack web-app, react-native, and XR Development
highlights: Enterprise-level web-app and react-native app development
Fun projects like Chappy (https://chappyai.com) sometimes!

volunteer.summary: Tech Education non-profit with focus to bring VR and top emerging tech to the women of color community via funded education, with community reachout achieved through engaging events!
highlights: Part of 2022 Tribeca Film Festival's Juneteenth event https://tribecafilm.com/juneteenth
2022 Tribeca Film Festival film page https://tribecafilm.com/films/exhibition-a-2022
Participated in development of the website and for a short time, work community leadership
Helped facilitate Tribeca interactive VR show by supporting performance artists who lead users through the experience in VR as a fun avatar, at designated showtimes!

projects.name: Chappy
highlights: Built in a week but an hours-heavy one at that
Implements openai API
Implements replicate.com API
Built on hapipal
Chappy picked the gradient anims =P!
Eyes following the mouse built by TripDragon! Thanks Trippy!
roles: All front-end development, except the googly eyes which were done by Trippy!

projects.name: Zill's Lab
projects.description: My own personal ShaderFes! More shaders to come later! This site also has a simple player controller with mouse and keyboard movement!

projects.name: Alakazam UI
projects.description: A subscription-based, build-your-own metaverse full SaaS platform complete with awesome scenes and avatars built by the Alakazam team!! I worked on the front-end that you'll find in the associated project link. I worked on the lobby UI and in-room icons and submenus UI!
highlights: Fun and responsive animated UI! Also check the slidy blue background that happens on hover after you enter a room and hover over an icon!
roles: Contributed to and lead some of the UI dev implementation

projects.name: MyWorld
projects.description: In MyWorld You Can... Meet, Stream and Video Chat in over 1,000 of our Private Virtual Spaces & Create your own 3D Environments to share with our global community Web 3D will change your world Choose your device and take a tour!
roles: Application features development including tweaks to the avatar system and front-end / back-end / CI/CD development

projects.name: Nearpeer
projects.description: A social platform for college students during to feel more connected to a community, is great for orientation times!
roles: Application features development including tweaks to the avatar system and front-end / back-end / CI/CD development

projects.name: Jobs in the US
projects.description: A job board site built with material design for some extra pizzazz! Hosted on hapipal!! Has an intricate Search Engine and Applicant Tracking System!
highlights: Integrated ATS system
roles: Application features development including tweaks to the avatar system and front-end / back-end / CI/CD development

projects.name: Architalx
projects.description: Talks dedicated to broadening the awareness and understanding of architecture, landscape architecture, and design.
highlights: Talks from architects
roles: Lead developer on the project, worked with a great designer, Justin Varbarakis on this one!
